titles.title: El Portal Administrative Site Land Exchange Act
To provide for a land exchange involving the El Portal Administrative Site of the Department of the Interior in the State of California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/15/1998--Introduced. El Portal Administrative Site Land Exchange Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to exchange a specified parcel of land administered as part of the El Portal Administrative Site in California for specified non-Federal lands located adjacent to such site and known as the Yosemite View parcel.
